titles.title: Worthy The Lamb That Was Slain

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Worthy The Lamb that was slain
(Sisters echo -
'Worthy The Lamb that was slain')
Worthy The Lamb that was slain
To recieve glory and honor
Wisdom and power
Worthy The Lamb that was
Worthy The Lamb that was
Worthy The Lamb that was slain
